desc: Catalogued over 700 values after tensile testing 4 different tubes. Assembled and calibrated a servo controller to simulate blood pumping. Then created solutions that has similar optical properties as blood and skin for the PPG sensor to detect the amplitude of the simulated blood through the tubes while engulfed by the skin solution.

Utilized google trends when selecting specific titles and descriptions to ensure that items would have appear more often due to the term frequency of the titles following up to date searches. Leading to an increase of 30% term frequency for objects that were uploaded by me.
Truck deck maintenance, refueling, sleep documentation, and unloaded over 200 boxes of payload materials to grocery stores, and shops.
